Html:
Dear Sir,

I am playing an MP3 file using "Simple Playback" , and using timer to get the current time against the total time. I noticed that the both totalTime & CurrentTime is double of the actual time.
I used your WinForm DEMO & got the same results. MP3 file length is 28 sec , while the Simple Playback demo shows that 59 sec.
NB. I used your Demo "Media Foundation Demo" with the same file , and shows the correct time, which is 28 sec. Unfortunately, I plan to use the application in WinXP , so the media Foundation will not be used.

To get sample mp3 I used , please check the below 4Shared link:
http://www.4shared.com/mp3/xgrK0h78ba/sample.html

Thanks,
Waleed

hi, I think that is a bug with AudioFileReader that was fixed just after the release of NAudio 1.7
BTW I am not downloading your MP3 file as I don't want to install their software or give them any access to my social networks.

Great , works fine... you are the man. !!!!

Thanks.
